item.title: Review: $399 Beosound A1 Portable Speaker Shows Why Bang & Olufsen Commands a Premium
item.description: Bang & Olufsen recently released the third generation of its award-winning Beosound A1 portable Bluetooth speaker, and after playing with it for a good month, I’m scrambling to come up with negatives.
